LI.LBody: Set MIDIControlSource to “Off” to avoid MIDI loops Connect MIDI-Out of Echoplex A with MIDI-In of Echoplex B. Connect MIDI-Out of Echoplex B with MIDI-In of Echoplex A.
Press Parameters on both units, until they are both in the MIDI parameter mode.
Press Load on Echoplex B. (goes into Upload-Mode showing '-')

L.LI: (A starts dumping showing 'd') (B starts uploading showing 'U')

LI.LBody: Wait until the entire loop is sent
Press Parameters on B to exit Upload-Mode (B shows 'P3' again)
Echoplex B has now uploaded the loop.

P: Echoplex A => Echoplex B (closed loop, B initiates)

LI.LBody: Press Load on Echoplex B. (goes into Upload-Mode showing '-')
Press Load on Echoplex A. (goes into Upload-Mode showing '-')
Press Load again on Echoplex B. (B sends a SampleRequest to A)

L.LI: (A starts dumping showing 'd') (B starts uploading showing 'U')

LI.LBody: Wait until the entire loop is sent
Press Parameters on A to exit Upload-Mode (A shows 'P3' again)
